p: Our analysis of JE epidemiology from 2005 to 2017 in Yunnan Province of China showed that, with the increase of JE vaccination coverage, the JE incidence rate decreased steadily. Majority of the cases occurred among Yunnan local residents. The shift of cases to adults, as opposed to children, indicates that the older age-groups are now at more risk. Lastly, the large amount of unknown treatment outcome revealed inherent weaknesses of the JE surveillance system.
